This is an open source UI block library implemented accroding to the
((http://bem.github.com/bem-method/html/all.en.html BEM methodology)).

Source code is hosted on GitHub: ((https://github.com/bem/bem-bl github.com/bem/bem-bl)).

Blocks are implemented at ##bemhtml## (templates), ##css##, client-side ##js##.\\
You need ((https://github.com/bem/bem-tools bem tools)) to use the library.

Ask your questions ((http://www.facebook.com/#!/groups/209713935765634/ on Facebook)).
